item.description:
EVENT: David has gotten us the use of house on Lake Winnipesaukee and this will be a great chance to get away and enjoy a weekend together with other Mosaic members. Plans include dinner on Friday, breakfasts on Saturday and Sunday, a potluck dinner Saturday night with some games afterward (bring a favorite) plus a couple of days of skiing and snow shoeing at a local touring center or just hanging out around the house.

Visits will be made to the Wolefboro Touring Center where there are 30kms of groomed trails and rentals are available. The Weekend starts on Friday with with some Shabbat prayers and dinner up on Black Cat island and ends Sunday after a day on the trails.

Event's Host: David Goldsmith and he is looking for a ride on Friday. Someone is going to have to help out and should call him a call 978-548-8019.

RSVP: Space is limited, 8 people and RSVPs by 2/24 to allow time for the planning. (will set up a waiting list if necessary).

MEET: Friday at 7:30 for prayers and dinner at the House, 128 Black Cat Island rd, Moultonborough NH

COST: $15 contribution for some housecleaning after we leave. Trail Pass - $12, XC ski & snow shoe rentals - $15 daily. The expenses for food and beverages will be worked out and a $5 charge for Meetup members and guests that can get credited towards a full Mosaic membership of $25.
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP for the details and the directions

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Lake Winnipesaukee Weekend
